00026 #ifndef TEXTFILECHECK_H
00027 #define TEXTFILECHECK_H
00028 
00029 #include "util/RegressionCheck.h"
00030 //
00031 #include <cstring>
00032 #include <fstream>
00033 #include <string>
00034 //
00035 
00040 class TextFileCheck : public RegressionCheck
00041 {
00042 public:
00050   TextFileCheck (const std::string &generatedFile, const std::string &goldFile, const unsigned int skipLines)
00051     : m_GeneratedFile (generatedFile), m_GoldFile (goldFile), m_SkipLines (skipLines)
00052   {
00053         m_Name = Util::fileRoot(generatedFile);
00054   }
00055 
00062   bool check (std::string& errorMsg)
00063   {
00064     // Open files.
00065     std::ifstream generatedStream (m_GeneratedFile.c_str());
00066     if (! generatedStream )
00067     {
00068       errorMsg = "Unable to open generated file " + m_GeneratedFile;
00069       return false;
00070     }
00071     std::ifstream goldStream (m_GoldFile.c_str());
00072     if (! goldStream )
00073     {
00074       errorMsg = "Unable to open gold file " + m_GoldFile;
00075       return false;
00076     }
00077     unsigned int lineCount = 0;
00078     const char* lineEndings = "\r\n";
00079     std::string goldLine, generatedLine;
00080     while (! goldStream.eof() && ! goldStream.fail())
00081     {
00082       getline (goldStream, goldLine);
00083       getline (generatedStream, generatedLine);
00084       if (generatedStream.eof() && ! goldStream.eof())
00085       {
00086         errorMsg = "The generated file, " + m_GeneratedFile
00087         + ", has fewer lines than the gold file, " + m_GoldFile;
00088         return false;
00089       }
00090       // Skip header lines which need not be equal.
00091       if (++lineCount > m_SkipLines)
00092       {
00093         // Avoid line ending hassles.
00094         goldLine = goldLine.erase (goldLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00095         generatedLine = generatedLine.erase (generatedLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00096         if (goldLine != generatedLine)
00097         {
00098           errorMsg = "Mismatch reading generated file " + m_GeneratedFile
00099           + ":\ngold line: '" + goldLine
00100           + "'\ngenerated line: '" + generatedLine + "'";
00101           return false;
00102         }
00103       }
00104     }
00105     // The two files should reach eof at the same time.
00106     if (! generatedStream.eof())
00107     {
00108       errorMsg = "The generated file, " + m_GeneratedFile
00109         + ", has more lines than the gold file, " + m_GoldFile;
00110       return false;
00111     }
00112 
00113     return true;
00114   }
00115 
00116 private:
00118   std::string m_GeneratedFile;
00120   std::string m_GoldFile;
00122   const unsigned int m_SkipLines;
00123 };
00124 
00125 #endif /* TEXTFILECHECK_H */
